trans-unit.source: Represents a control that acts as a container for a group of controls within a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Representa um controle que atua como um contêiner para um grupo de controles dentro de um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: In this topic: - [Introduction](#introduction) - [Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## Introduction The View control is a container for a group of controls.
trans-unit.target: Neste tópico:- [Introdução](#introduction) - [sintaxe declarativa](#declarative_syntax) # # controle de exibição a introdução é um contêiner para um grupo de controles.

trans-unit.source: A View control must always be contained within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control.
trans-unit.target: Um controle de exibição sempre deve estar contido em um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>

trans-unit.source: Only one View control at a time can be defined as the active view within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control.
trans-unit.target: Somente um controle de exibição de cada vez pode ser definido como modo de exibição ativo em um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A> property specifies the active View control within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.Views%2A> collection of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A>propriedade especifica o controle View ativo dentro de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.Views%2A>coleção de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.Views%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The active view control is rendered to the client, as long as the containing <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control is visible.
trans-unit.target: O controle de exibição ativo é renderizado para o cliente, contanto que o contendo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>controle está visível.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Visible%2A> property to determine whether a View control and its child controls are visible on the page and rendered to the client.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Visible%2A>propriedade para determinar se um controle de exibição e seus controles filhos são visíveis na página e renderizado para o cliente.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: A View control can contain controls of any type, including other <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> controls.
trans-unit.target: Um controle de exibição pode conter controles de qualquer tipo, incluindo outros <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>controles.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>

trans-unit.source: A View control does not support any style properties.
trans-unit.target: Um controle de exibição não oferece suporte a quaisquer propriedades de estilo.

trans-unit.source: To apply styles to a View control, add one or more <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> controls to the View control.
trans-unit.target: Para aplicar estilos a um controle de exibição, adicione um ou mais <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>controles para o controle de exibição.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>

trans-unit.source: The View class provides the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate> events.
trans-unit.target: A classe de exibição fornece a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate>eventos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate> event is raised when the current View control becomes the active view.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate>é gerado quando o controle de exibição atual é o modo ativo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate>

trans-unit.source: This occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A> property changes or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.SetActiveView%2A> method is called to specify a different View control.
trans-unit.target: Isso ocorre quando o valor da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A>alterações de propriedade ou o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.SetActiveView%2A>método é chamado para especificar um controle de exibição diferente.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.SetActiveView%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if `View1` is the active view within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control, when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A> property changes to specify `View2`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate> event is raised for `View2` and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate> event is raised for `View1`.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se `View1` é o modo ativo em um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>controle, quando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A>alterações de propriedade para especificar `View2`, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate>é gerado para `View2` e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate>é gerado para `View1`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>

trans-unit.source: To allow users to navigate between multiple View controls within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control, you can add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control to each View control.
trans-unit.target: Para permitir que os usuários navegarem entre vários controles de exibição em um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>controle, você pode adicionar um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>controle para cada controle View.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control's `CommandName` property to the ID of the View control to navigate to.
trans-unit.target: Definir o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>do controle `CommandName` propriedade para a identificação do controle de exibição para navegar até.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>

trans-unit.source: For a code example, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewChanged>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo de código, consulte <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewChanged>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewChanged>

trans-unit.source: For more information on manipulating View controls within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> topic.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de controles de exibição dentro de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>, consulte o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>tópico.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>

trans-unit.source: ## Declarative Syntax ``` ```
trans-unit.target: # # Sintaxe de declarativa``` ```

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"></xref> control becomes the active view.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o atual <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"> </xref> controle torna-se o modo ativo.

trans-unit.source: The Activate event is raised when the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control becomes the active view.
trans-unit.target: O evento Activate é disparado quando atual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>controle torna-se o modo ativo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: This occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A> property changes or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.SetActiveView%2A> method is called to specify a different <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control.
trans-unit.target: Isso ocorre quando o valor da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A>alterações de propriedade ou o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.SetActiveView%2A>método é chamado para especificar outro <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.SetActiveView%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if `View1` is the active view within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control, when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A> property changes to specify `View2`, the Activate event is raised for `View2` and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate> event is raised for `View1`.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se `View1` é o modo ativo em um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>controle, quando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A>alterações de propriedade para especificar `View2`, o evento Activate é gerado para `View2` e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate>é gerado para `View1`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the current active <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"></xref> control becomes inactive.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o ativo atual <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"> </xref> controle se torna inativo.

trans-unit.source: The Deactivate event is raised when the current active <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control becomes inactive.
trans-unit.target: O evento Deactivate é disparado quando ativo atual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>controle se torna inativo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control becomes inactive when the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A> property changes or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.SetActiveView%2A> method is called to specify a different <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>controle se torna inativo quando o valor da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A>alterações de propriedade ou o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.SetActiveView%2A>método é chamado para especificar outro <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.SetActiveView%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: For example, if `View1` is the active view within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control, when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A> property changes to specify `View2`, the Deactivate event is raised for `View1` and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate> event is raised for `View2`.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se `View1` é o modo ativo em um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>controle, quando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A>alterações de propriedade para especificar `View2`, o evento Deactivate é gerado para `View1` e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate>é gerado para `View2`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether themes apply to this control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se os temas se aplicam a este controle.

trans-unit.source: The EnableTheming property indicates whether themes are enabled for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade EnableTheming indica se os temas estão habilitados para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: The EnableTheming property also affects whether themes are enabled for the controls contained in its <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade EnableTheming também afeta a capacidade de temas são habilitados para os controles contidos no seu <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A?displayProperty=fullName>coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When the EnableTheming property is `true`, the application's theme directory is searched for control skins to apply.
trans-unit.target: Quando a propriedade EnableTheming for `true`, diretório de tema do aplicativo é pesquisado capas de controle aplicar.

trans-unit.source: If no skin for the particular control exists in the theme directory, a skin is not applied.
trans-unit.target: Se nenhuma capa de controle específico existe no diretório do tema, não é aplicada uma capa.

trans-unit.source: When the EnableTheming property is `false`, the theme directory is not searched and the contents of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SkinID%2A> property are not used.
trans-unit.target: Quando a propriedade EnableTheming for `false`, o diretório de tema não é pesquisado e o conteúdo do <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SkinID%2A>propriedade não são usados.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SkinID%2A>

trans-unit.source: A control can override the EnableTheming value set by its parent control, or by the containing page.
trans-unit.target: Um controle pode substituir o valor de EnableTheming definido pelo seu controle pai, ou pelo conteúdo da página.

trans-unit.source: For example, if a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control has EnableTheming set to `false`, you can selectively apply themes to child controls contained within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableTheming%2A> property to `true` on the individual child controls.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>controle tem EnableTheming definido como `false`, você pode aplicar seletivamente os temas para controles filho contidos no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>controle definindo o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableTheming%2A>propriedade `true` nos controles filho individuais.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableTheming%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to use themes; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>usar temas; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate"> </xref> evento o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate> event is raised when the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control becomes the active view.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate>é gerado quando o atual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>controle torna-se o modo ativo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados de evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate"> </xref> evento o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate> event is raised when the current active <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control becomes inactive.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate>é gerado quando o ativo atual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>controle se torna inativo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados de evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"></xref> control is visible.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"> </xref> controle está visível.

trans-unit.source: Use the Visible property to determine whether the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control is visible and rendered to the client.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade Visible para determinar se o atual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>controle está visível ou processado ao cliente.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: For a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control to be visible on the rendered page, it must be the active view in its containing <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control, and the containing <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control must be visible.
trans-unit.target: Para um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>controlar para ficar visível na página renderizada, ele deverá ser o modo ativo em que o contém <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>controle e que o contém <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>controle deve ser visível.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: If the containing <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control is not visible on the page, or if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control is not the active view, then the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control and its child controls are not rendered.
trans-unit.target: Se o contendo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>controle não está visível na página, ou se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>controle não é o modo ativo, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>controle e seus controles filhos não são renderizados.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The Visible property is set internally based on the visibility and active view for the containing parent control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Visível a propriedade é definida internamente com base na visibilidade e modo de exibição ativo para o controle pai contém.

trans-unit.source: If you set this property at run time, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se você definir essa propriedade em tempo de execução, um <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>exceção será lançada.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: If you set the Visible property at design time, any changes to the property are ignored.
trans-unit.target: Se você definir a propriedade visível no tempo de design, as alterações para a propriedade são ignoradas.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"></xref> control is visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"> </xref> controle estiver visível; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set this property at run time.
trans-unit.target: Foi feita uma tentativa de definir esta propriedade em tempo de execução.
